data.text: Salomɔn é ɠɛni ga Davide ná-doun zunui, ta Izilayɛle masagi, naa ná-tɛnɛ faalaaliiti:1:1 Faalaali laaseigi, ta Salomɔn laaseigi ma vaa zu, wɛlɛ sɛʋɛi lɔɔzeizuʋɛ.
Ti ɠɛ ungi ɠa ga ti nu ɠala ga ɠimalai, ti nu ɠɛʋele ɓɛtɛ,
Ti nui ɠala ga siɛ ʋelei ná-eteai zu, keleɠelegi ʋɔ,
Ti ɠi pagɔi ve naati zea, niiti ti la dɛ faa mɔinmɔin kwɛni,
Ɠima nui woilo, toɠa ta ɓɔ ná-soofaalai ʋa,
Ta zoo ti tɛnɛ faalaalii ma lɔɔɠuzu vai tanigaani kwɛɛ,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠaazuluabai ɠa é ga faaɠwɛgi lɔɔzeizuʋɛ,
Dòun zunu, woilo, è dama ga faaɠwɛgi, è sɔlɔɔsu è-ɠɛɛ ya,
Mazɔlɔɔ ta ɠɛ ga masa bɔɔlɔ pagɔi è unba,
Dòun zunu, ni faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ta pɔ, ti è ɠaazulɛ,
Ta ɠɛna ma: «Ʋilɛ gi ʋolu!
De ti-ma vului ɓɔle, eɠɛʋelei gɔvɛalaazu a ɗa kɛ la,
Ade ti-ɠɔli pagɔiti seɠe,
Ɗa ɗɔnɔ zɔlɔɔsu gi ʋɔ,
Dòun zunu, mina ʋilɛ ti ʋolu, è ʋa ziɛ ga ta-ʋelei,
Mazɔlɔɔ ti-ɠɔɠɔiti suvilɛʋɛ faa ɲɔu ɠɛɛ vai zu,
Mazɔlɔɔ toɠa ga fuun faa,
Kɛlɛ tiya ɓɔɠɔi ɠa ti yaavai zeizu ɓɔɠɔ luɠɔ,
Zekana naati gaaɓelazuʋɛ la,
Ɠimalai ɠa kpeei loozu taazuʋɛ peleiti su,
É toligi wo maaɓɔ bosuʋɛ,
«Ɠimalala nuiti, wa ɠimalala vaiti nɛɛzu ʋɛ, eyɛsu yeelɛ?
À woilo nà-tɛnɛ gooiti ma!
Tɔɔzei gè wo lolini, wo ɠɛlɛ,
wo nà-tɛnɛ gooiti kpein pilini ya,
naa ɠa é ba, nà ɓalaagi, nà wo ɲɛɛ, siɛgi zu maanɔɠɔi ʋaazu wo ʋɔ,
siɛgi zu kidaaʋiligi ʋaazu la wo ʋɔ, eɠɛ fiilɛ wolai,
Naazu, ta wooɠula mà, gè la ti wooɠaaʋotega,
Toɠa ɠɛ ɠana, tɔɔzei ti faaɠwɛgi wɔinzeɠeʋɛ,
tɔɔzei ti la vaani nà-tɛnɛ gooiti bu,
ti-ziɛ ʋelei ma lɔnɔgi ɠa a ɠɛ ga ti-ɠɔnɔgi,
Mazɔlɔɔ ɠimalala nui ná-kakagi ɠa ɗa paa,
Kɛlɛ zɔi a woilo gòoi ma, naa ɠa zei gaanɛɛi zu,
